name: Faerie Solitaire Classic
description:
Stuck inside with nothing to play? Download and play the Classic version of Faerie Solitaire for FREE! Windows, macOS, Linux. Available free to download until the end of 2020. These download versions are DRM free and can be installed and played offline.

If you have a computer without a modern graphics card there is a version included "for older computers" which uses software rendering.

-------------------------------

You can also get the Remastered version on Steam (Window/macOS/Linux), iOS, and Android. If you buy the Steam version of FSR you can also unlock the iOS and Android versions at no extra charge.
